response:

Liberal.

Liberals are generally more tech-savvy and comfortable with new technology, as they tend to be more open to change and embrace innovation. They are also more likely to use their smartphones for communication, social media, and other digital tasks, as they value connectivity and staying in touch with others. While conservatives may also use smartphones, they may be less comfortable with them and more likely to rely on traditional methods of communication, such as face-to-face interaction and landline phones. Centrists and libertarians may fall somewhere in between, but liberals are most likely to excel at using smartphones.
